verses.text: \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*:

\w Speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*: \w The|strong="H0559"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* hath \w an|strong="H1961"\w* \w issue|strong="H1696"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* seed, \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1320"\w* \w then|strong="H1961"\w* \w shall|strong="H1931"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* judged subject \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* evil, \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* filthy humour, \w at|strong="H1961"\w* every moment, cleaveth \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w his|strong="H1961"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*, \w and|strong="H1320"\w* gathereth \w there|strong="H1961"\w*.

\w Every|strong="H3605"\w* \w bed|strong="H4904"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* sleepeth, \w shall|strong="H0834"\w* \w be|strong="H3605"\w* \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w*, \w and|strong="H3427"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w place|strong="H4904"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* sitteth.

\w If|strong="H3588"\w* such \w a|strong="H3588"\w* man cast \w his|strong="H3526"\w* spittle upon \w him|strong="H2930"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H4325"\w* \w clean|strong="H2889"\w*, \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H2100"\w* \w wash|strong="H3526"\w* \w his|strong="H3526"\w* \w clothes|strong="H0899"\w*: \w and|strong="H4325"\w* being \w washed|strong="H7364"\w* \w with|strong="H2100"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H2100"\w* \w be|strong="H4325"\w* \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w evening|strong="H6153"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4325"\w* \w whatsoever|strong="H3605"\w* \w has|strong="H0834"\w* \w been|strong="H1961"\w* \w under|strong="H8478"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* hath \w the|strong="H3605"\w* issue \w of|strong="H8478"\w* seed, \w shall|strong="H0834"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w evening|strong="H6153"\w*. \w He|strong="H0834"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* carrieth \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H8478"\w* \w these|strong="H3605"\w* \w things|strong="H3605"\w*, \w shall|strong="H0834"\w* \w wash|strong="H3526"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w clothes|strong="H0899"\w*: \w and|strong="H4325"\w* \w being|strong="H1961"\w* \w washed|strong="H7364"\w* \w with|strong="H3605"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H0834"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w evening|strong="H6153"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w eighth|strong="H8066"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* turtles, \w or|strong="H0176"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w young|strong="H1121"\w* \w pigeons|strong="H3123"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w door|strong="H6607"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* testimony, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*:
